attributes.action: recommend a Damehood for Petula Clark -  which is long overdue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apart from her long, successful singing and acting career Petula is an Ambassadress for Britain and has supported many organisations such as UNICEF

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "recommend a Damehood for Petula Clark - which is long overdue."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15068.asp

Prime Minister's Office
